Module id.ac.itb.stei.informatika.fifteenp
Package id.ac.itb.stei.informatika.fifteenp

Class FifteenPuzzle

java.lang.Object
id.ac.itb.stei.informatika.fifteenp.FifteenPuzzle
public class FifteenPuzzle extends Object
FifteenPuzzle represents a 15-puzzle solver that holds a single FifteenMatrix as a puzzle.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final FifteenMatrix
    SOLUTION
    The solution of the 15-puzzle as a FifteenMatrix object.
    static final long
    SOLUTION_ID
    The integer representation of the 15-puzzle solution.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FifteenPuzzle(FifteenMatrix puzzle)
    Creates a new FifteenPuzzle to solve a specific puzzle based on specified FifteenMatrix object as its puzzle.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    generatedStates()
    Counts the amount of generated states to solve this FifteenPuzzle.
    ArrayList<Direction>
    getSolutionPathDir()
    Retrieves solution path to reach the goal state of this FifteenPuzzle as a list of Direction.
    ArrayList<FifteenMatrix>
    getSolutionPathMatrix()
    Retrieves solution path to reach the goal state of this FifteenPuzzle as a list of FifteenMatrix.
    void
    solve()
    Solves the given puzzle using branch and bound algorithm.
